name: Cut Their Losses
description:
Play as a naughty boy who is trying to destroy his schoolmates' lost items with his razor-sharp scissors, but make sure you don't get caught by the scary office lady!

  • Press and hold [z] to take out the scissor
  • Tap [x] to cut the items
  • Release [z] when the office lady is about to look, or it's game over!
